text: "Making Love Out of Nothing at All" is a 1983 power ballad by English- Australian band Air Supply. It was taken from their 1983 album Greatest Hits. It went to number 2 in the United States, number 3 in Canada, number 5 in South Africa, number 30 in Ireland, number 45 in Australia and number 80 in the United Kingdom. ==Bonnie Tyler version== In 1995, Welsh singer Bonnie Tyler released a cover version of the single from her 11th studio album Free Spirit. ==References== Category:1983 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Air Supply songs Category:Bonnie Tyler songs Category:Soft rock songs
title: Making Love Out of Nothing at All
